1.3.2.changelog: Shield stun Mechanics and Enchantment Limiter Fix - Added a new shield stun mechanic that temporarily disables shield blocking after taking damage, adding a skill-based element to combat. Also resolved a critical bug in the enchantment limiter feature that caused server crashes when players attempted to enchant items with disallowed enchantments.

1.3.1.changelog: Enchantment Limiter Fix - Resolved a critical bug in the enchantment limiter feature that caused server crashes when players attempted to enchant items with disallowed enchantments.

1.3.0.changelog: Complete rebrand from SMP Core to Vanilla Core - Updated all package names, plugin references, and documentation

1.2.1.changelog: Open Source Migration - MIT License, GitHub workflows, CodeRabbit AI, comprehensive documentation

1.2.0.changelog: Added Server Restart feature with scheduled restarts, countdown warnings, and GUI configuration
